verses.verse: הִנָּ֨ךְ <WH2005> behold יָפָ֤ה <WH3303> Behold thou [art] fair רַעְיָתִי֙ <WH7474> my love הִנָּ֣ךְ <WH2005> behold יָפָ֔ה <WH3303> behold thou [art] fair עֵינַ֣יִךְ <WH5869> eyes יוֹנִ֔ים <WH3123> thou [hast] doves' מִבַּ֖עַד <WH1157> within לְצַמָּתֵ֑ךְ <WH6777> thy locks שַׂעְרֵךְ֙ <WH8181> thy hair כְּעֵ֣דֶר <WH5739> [is] as a flock הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <WH5795> of goats שֶׁגָּלְשׁ֖וּ <WH1570> that appear מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> from mount גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

שִׁנַּ֙יִךְ֙ <WH8127> Thy teeth כְּעֵ֣דֶר <WH5739> [are] like a flock הַקְּצוּב֔וֹת <WH7094> [of sheep that are even] shorn שֶׁעָל֖וּ <WH5927> which came up מִן־ <WH4480> up הָרַחְצָ֑ה <WH7367> from the washing שֶׁכֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All מַתְאִימ֔וֹת <WH8382> whereof every one bear twins וְשַׁכֻּלָ֖ה <WH7909> and none [is] barren אֵ֥ין <WH369> one בָּהֶֽם׃

כְּח֤וּט <WH2339> [are] like a thread הַשָּׁנִי֙ <WH8144> of scarlet שִׂפְתֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH8193> Thy lips וּמִדְבָּרֵ֖יךְ <WH4057> and thy speech נָאוֶ֑ה <WH5000> [is] comely כְּפֶ֤לַח <WH6400> [are] like a piece הָֽרִמּוֹן֙ <WH7416> of a pomegranate רַקָּתֵ֔ךְ <WH7541> thy temples מִבַּ֖עַד <WH1157> within לְצַמָּתֵֽךְ׃ <WH6777> thy locks

כְּמִגְדַּ֤ל <WH4026> [is] like the tower דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> of David צַוָּארֵ֔ךְ <WH6677> Thy neck בָּנ֖וּי <WH1129> builded לְתַלְפִּיּ֑וֹת <WH8530> for an armoury אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> a thousand הַמָּגֵן֙ <WH4043> bucklers תָּל֣וּי <WH8518> whereon there hang עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All שִׁלְטֵ֥י <WH7982> all shields הַגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> of mighty men

שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> Thy two שָׁדַ֛יִךְ <WH7699> breasts כִּשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> [are] like two עֳפָרִ֖ים <WH6082> young תְּאוֹמֵ֣י <WH8380> that are twins צְבִיָּ֑ה <WH6646> roes הָרוֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> which feed בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <WH7799> among the lilies

עַ֤ד <WH5704> Until שֶׁיָּפ֙וּחַ֙ <WH6315> break הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> Until the day וְנָ֖סוּ <WH5127> flee away הַצְּלָלִ֑ים <WH6752> and the shadows אֵ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> will go לִי֙ אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> me to the mountain הַמּ֔וֹר <WH4753> of myrrh וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to גִּבְעַ֖ת <WH1389> and to the hill הַלְּבוֹנָֽה׃ <WH3828> of frankincense
כֻּלָּ֤ךְ <WH3605> are altogether יָפָה֙ <WH3303> Thou [art] all fair רַעְיָתִ֔י <WH7474> my love וּמ֖וּם <WH3971> [there is] no spot אֵ֥ין <WH369> and there בָּֽךְ׃ ס

אִתִּ֤י <WH854> from מִלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> with me from Lebanon כַּלָּ֔ה <WH3618> [my] spouse אִתִּ֖י <WH854> from מִלְּבָנ֣וֹן <WH3844> with me from Lebanon תָּב֑וֹאִי <WH935> Come תָּשׁ֣וּרִי ׀ <WH7789> look מֵרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> from the top אֲמָנָ֗ה <WH549> of Amana מֵרֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> from the top שְׂנִיר֙ <WH8149> of Shenir וְחֶרְמ֔וֹן <WH2768> and Hermon מִמְּעֹנ֣וֹת <WH4585> dens אֲרָי֔וֹת <WH738> from the lions' מֵֽהַרְרֵ֖י <WH2042> from the mountains נְמֵרִֽים׃ <WH5246> of the leopards

לִבַּבְתִּ֖נִי <WH3823> Thou hast ravished my heart אֲחֹתִ֣י <WH269> my sister כַלָּ֑ה <WH3618> [my] spouse לִבַּבְתִּ֙ינִי֙ <WH3823> thou hast ravished my heart [בְּאַחַד כ] (בְּאַחַ֣ת <WH259> A single ק) מֵעֵינַ֔יִךְ <WH5869> of thine eyes בְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> with one עֲנָ֖ק <WH6060> chain מִצַּוְּרֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH6677> of thy neck

מַה־ <WH4100> How יָּפ֥וּ <WH3302> How fair דֹדַ֖יִךְ <WH1730> is thy love אֲחֹתִ֣י <WH269> my sister כַלָּ֑ה <WH3618> [my] spouse מַה־ <WH4100> How טֹּ֤בוּ <WH2895> how much better דֹדַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1730> is thy love מִיַּ֔יִן <WH3196> than wine וְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> and the smell שְׁמָנַ֖יִךְ <WH8081> of thine ointments מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּשָׂמִֽים׃ <WH1314> than all spices

נֹ֛פֶת <WH5317> [as] the honeycomb תִּטֹּ֥פְנָה <WH5197> drop שִׂפְתוֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH8193> Thy lips כַּלָּ֑ה <WH3618> O [my] spouse דְּבַ֤שׁ <WH1706> honey וְחָלָב֙ <WH2461> and milk תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> are under לְשׁוֹנֵ֔ךְ <WH3956> [are] under thy tongue וְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> and the smell שַׂלְמֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH8008> of thy garments כְּרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> [is] like the smell לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> of Lebanon ס

גַּ֥ן ׀ <WH1588> A garden נָע֖וּל <WH5274> inclosed אֲחֹתִ֣י <WH269> [is] my sister כַלָּ֑ה <WH3618> [my] spouse גַּ֥ל <WH1530> a spring נָע֖וּל <WH5274> shut up מַעְיָ֥ן <WH4599> a fountain חָתֽוּם׃ <WH2856> sealed

שְׁלָחַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7973> Thy plants פַּרְדֵּ֣ס <WH6508> [are] an orchard רִמּוֹנִ֔ים <WH7416> of pomegranates עִ֖ם <WH5973> with פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> fruits מְגָדִ֑ים <WH4022> with pleasant כְּפָרִ֖ים <WH3724> camphire עִם־ <WH5973> with נְרָדִֽים׃ <WH5373> with spikenard

נֵ֣רְדְּ ׀ <WH5373> Spikenard וְכַרְכֹּ֗ם <WH3750> and saffron קָנֶה֙ <WH7070> calamus וְקִנָּמ֔וֹן <WH7076> and cinnamon עִ֖ם <WH5973> along כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> with all trees לְבוֹנָ֑ה <WH3828> of frankincense מֹ֚ר <WH4753> myrrh וַאֲהָל֔וֹת <WH174> and aloes עִ֖ם <WH5973> along כָּל־ <WH3605> all רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> with all the chief בְשָׂמִֽים׃ <WH1314> spices

מַעְיַ֣ן <WH4599> A fountain גַּנִּ֔ים <WH1588> of gardens בְּאֵ֖ר <WH875> a well מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> of living וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <WH5140> and streams מִן־ <WH4480> at לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> from Lebanon

ע֤וּרִי <WH5782> Awake צָפוֹן֙ <WH6828> O north wind וּב֣וֹאִי <WH935> and come תֵימָ֔ן <WH8486> thou south הָפִ֥יחִי <WH6315> blow גַנִּ֖י <WH1588> upon my garden יִזְּל֣וּ <WH5140> thereof may flow out בְשָׂמָ֑יו <WH1314> [that] the spices יָבֹ֤א <WH935> come דוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> Let my beloved לְגַנּ֔וֹ <WH1588> into his garden וְיֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> and eat פְּרִ֥י <WH6529> fruits מְגָדָֽיו׃ <WH4022> his pleasant
